detaileddescription.para: cache_inode_is_dir_empty: checks if a directory is empty or not. No mutex management.
Checks if a directory is empty or not. No mutex management

parameterdescription.para: [IN] entry to be checked (should be of type DIR_BEGINNING)

simplesect.para: CACHE_INODE_BAD_TYPE is pentry is not of type DIR_BEGINNING
CACHE_INODE_DIR_NOT_EMPTY if pentry is a non empty DIR_BEGINNING

detaileddescription.para: cache_inode_is_dir_empty_WithLock: checks if a directory is empty or not, BUT has lock management.
Checks if a directory is empty or not, BUT has lock management.

parameterdescription.para: [IN] entry to be checked (should be of type DIR_BEGINNING)

simplesect.para: CACHE_INODE_BAD_TYPE is pentry is not of type DIR_BEGINNING
CACHE_INODE_DIR_NOT_EMPTY if pentry is a non empty DIR_BEGINNING

detaileddescription.para: cache_inode_clean_internal: remove a pentry from cache and all LRUs, and release related resources.

parameterdescription.para: [IN] entry to be deleted from cache
[IN] The cache hash table
[INOUT] ressource allocated by the client for the nfs management.

memberdef.argsstring: (cache_entry_t *pentry, fsal_name_t *pnode_name, fsal_attrib_list_t *pattr, hash_table_t *ht, cache_inode_client_t *pclient, fsal_op_context_t *pcontext, cache_inode_status_t *pstatus, int use_mutex)
memberdef.name: cache_inode_remove_sw

detaileddescription.para: cache_inode_remove_sw: removes a pentry addressed by its parent pentry and its FSAL name. Mutex management is switched.
Removes a pentry addressed by its parent pentry and its FSAL name. Mutex management is switched.

parameterdescription.para: [IN] entry for the parent directory to be managed.
[IN] name of the entry that we are looking for in the cache.
[OUT] attributes for the entry that we have found.
[IN] hash table used for the cache, unused in this call.
[INOUT] ressource allocated by the client for the nfs management.
[IN] FSAL credentials
[OUT] returned status.

simplesect.para: CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS if operation is a success
CACHE_INODE_LRU_ERROR if allocation error occured when validating the entry

memberdef.argsstring: (cache_entry_t *pentry, fsal_name_t *pnode_name, fsal_attrib_list_t *pattr, hash_table_t *ht, cache_inode_client_t *pclient, fsal_op_context_t *pcontext, cache_inode_status_t *pstatus)
memberdef.name: cache_inode_remove_no_mutex

detaileddescription.para: cache_inode_remove_no_mutex: removes a pentry addressed by its parent pentry and its FSAL name. No mutex management.
Removes a pentry addressed by its parent pentry and its FSAL name.

parameterdescription.para: [IN] entry for the parent directory to be managed.
[IN] name of the entry that we are looking for in the cache.
[OUT] attributes for the entry that we have found.
[IN] hash table used for the cache, unused in this call.
[INOUT] ressource allocated by the client for the nfs management.
[IN] FSAL credentials
[OUT] returned status.

simplesect.para: CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS if operation is a success
CACHE_INODE_LRU_ERROR if allocation error occured when validating the entry

memberdef.argsstring: (cache_entry_t *pentry, fsal_name_t *pnode_name, fsal_attrib_list_t *pattr, hash_table_t *ht, cache_inode_client_t *pclient, fsal_op_context_t *pcontext, cache_inode_status_t *pstatus)
memberdef.name: cache_inode_remove

detaileddescription.para: cache_inode_remove: removes a pentry addressed by its parent pentry and its FSAL name.
Removes a pentry addressed by its parent pentry and its FSAL name.

parameterdescription.para: [IN] entry for the parent directory to be managed.
[IN] name of the entry that we are looking for in the cache.
[OUT] attributes for the entry that we have found.
[IN] hash table used for the cache, unused in this call.
[INOUT] ressource allocated by the client for the nfs management.
[IN] FSAL credentials
[OUT] returned status.

simplesect.para: CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS if operation is a success
CACHE_INODE_LRU_ERROR if allocation error occured when validating the entry

briefdescription.para: Removes an entry of any type.
